name: Samantha: The Right to Happiness (demo)
description:
Having gone through all the difficulties and trials on their way, Semyon and Samantha began a new life in America.
But life, which was supposed to be a fairy tale, turned out to be more severe in reality. Samantha fell into the hands of demanding directors, and Semyon gradually plunged into melancholy.
However, life is like a piano: a black key is always followed by a white one. A long-awaited vacation will help the Sams realize what really matters to them. And at the same time - to unravel the mystery of one old letter.

This story is an unofficial continuation of the modification "Samantha" from the admirers of the original, who could not just come to terms with the cruel inscription "The End".
